formula.name: 5th Quasi Perpendicular
formula.reference: Xrn = abs(Xr) * (Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + 5 * Xi2 * Xi2) + Cr; Xin = Ci - Xi * abs(5 * Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Xi2 * Xi2);
formula.perturbation: xrn = diffabs(Xr, xr) * (Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + 5 * Xi2 * Xi2) + abs(Xr + xr) * (4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xr * xr2 * xr + xr2 * xr2 - 20 * Xr2 * Xi * xi - 10 * Xr2 * xi2 - 20 * Xr * xr * Xi2 - 40 * Xr * xr * Xi * xi - 20 * Xr * xr * xi2 - 10 * xr2 * Xi2 - 20 * xr2 * Xi * xi - 10 * xr2 * xi2 + 20 * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 30 * Xi2 * xi2 + 20 * Xi * xi2 * xi + 5 * xi2 * xi2) + cr; xin = ( - Xi) * diffabs(5 * Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Xi2 * Xi2, 4 * xi * Xi2 * Xi - 20 * xr * Xr * Xi2 + 6 * xi2 * Xi2 - 10 * xr2 * Xi2 - 20 * xi * Xr2 * Xi - 40 * xr * xi * Xr * Xi + 4 * xi2 * xi * Xi - 20 * xr2 * xi * Xi + 20 * xr * Xr2 * Xr - 10 * xi2 * Xr2 + 30 * xr2 * Xr2 - 20 * xr * xi2 * Xr + 20 * xr2 * xr * Xr + xi2 * xi2 - 10 * xr2 * xi2 + 5 * xr2 * xr2) - xi * abs(Xi2 * Xi2 + 4 * xi * Xi2 * Xi - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 - 20 * xr * Xr * Xi2 + 6 * xi2 * Xi2 - 10 * xr2 * Xi2 - 20 * xi * Xr2 * Xi - 40 * xr * xi * Xr * Xi + 4 * xi2 * xi * Xi - 20 * xr2 * xi * Xi + 5 * Xr2 * Xr2 + 20 * xr * Xr2 * Xr - 10 * xi2 * Xr2 + 30 * xr2 * Xr2 - 20 * xr * xi2 * Xr + 20 * xr2 * xr * Xr + xi2 * xi2 - 10 * xr2 * xi2 + 5 * xr2 * xr2) + ci;
